thread.title: Greenwood School District placed on probation
thread.title_full: Greenwood School District placed on probation - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Greenwood School District placed on probation
text:
GREENWOOD, Miss. (AP) - Under scrutiny by the state Department of Education for the past two years, the Greenwood School District has now been put on probation for failing to meet some accreditation standards.
The Greenwood Commonwealth reports ( http://bit.ly/1PuLn2Q ) the state took the action last week after an audit by the Mississippi Office of Accreditation found the district failed to comply with state regulations.
During the next two months, the district must develop a plan to address deficiencies. The plan must include a timeline for specific improvement measures. If the district fails to adhere to that timeline, its accreditation could be withdrawn.
In 2014, the district's accreditation status was downgraded to "pending" and it faced a possible state takeover before satisfying state officials and having its accreditation restored.
Information from: The Greenwood Commonwealth, http://www.gwcommonwealth.com
